name: Turtle spirit: Resilience
desc: The power of the unyielding turtle fills you with resilience. You feel indestructible.
apply_message: The power of the unyielding turtle fills you with resilience. You feel indestructible
remove_message: You feel the turtle spirit's loaned power leaving your body.
